_info: Feel free to use this file for your own purposes, as long as you credit me
_version: Version 1.0, up to date as of 10 April 2017

arcanum steward.name: Arcanum Steward
arcanum steward.text: After you cast a spell, give your hero +1 Attack this turn.

novice knight.name: Novice Knight
novice knight.text: Deathhowl: Add a Vengeful Veteran to your hand.

lad.name: Novice Knight
lad.text: Deathhowl: Add a Vengeful Veteran to your hand.

phalanx fighter.name: Phalanx Fighter
phalanx fighter.text: Has +1 Attack while next to an ally.

spellboxer.name: Spellboxer
spellboxer.text: After you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.

summoner's aide.name: Summoner's Aide
summoner's aide.text: Your minions can be summoned next to this minion.

advance scout.name: Advance Scout

buccaneer.name: Buccaneer

devoted curate.text: Warcry: This minion and your hero gain a Damage Shield.

lightdancer.text: Warcry: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.

rankbreaker.name: Rankbreaker

raven's messenger.text: Warcry: Give a minion Flying. It can't act this turn. Flying.

rook.name: Rook
rook.text: Can move any distance in a line. Gain +1 Attack this turn for each tile moved.

royal magnate.text: Bloodtoll: Discard the lowest cost card in your hand. Draw 2 cards.

roar earburst.name: Roar Earburst
roar earburst.text: Deal 3 damage to all enemies next to your hero.

hunting scout.name: Hunting Scout
hunting scout.text: Warcry: Draw a random minion from your deck. If you control a Primal, draw two instead.

menagerie.name: Menagerie
menagerie.text: Summon four Spirit Primals in a small area.

viperfang primal.name: Viperfang Primal
viperfang primal.text: Warcry: Give your Primals Poison this turn. Poison.

grand wyrm primal.name: Grand Wyrm Primal
grand wyrm primal.text: Choose a minion. Exile it, then summon this in its place. Cannot Move.

venerator wynn.name: Venerator Wynn
venerator wynn.text: Ability (0): Give a friendly minion +1 Attack this turn.

force blast.name: Force Blast
force blast.text: Deal 1 damage and Stun a minion in line of sight for a full round.

vaporize stone.name: Vaporize Stone
vaporize stone.text: Destroy a Boulder. Draw a card.

ascension.name: Ascension
ascension.text: Teleport an ally to any High Ground. Draw a card.

chaotic surge.name: Chaotic Surge
chaotic surge.text: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy.

desperate prayer.name: Desperate Prayer
desperate prayer.text: Draw three cards. Discard them at the end of this turn if they're still in your hand.

luminator initiate.name: Luminator Initiate
luminator initiate.text: Warcry: Deal 1 damage to a unit. If you've cast a spell this turn, deal 2 instead.

path's favor.name: Path's Favor
path's favor.text: Give a friendly minion +1 Attack and a Damage Shield.

summon blades.name: Summon Blades
summon blades.text: Summon two Winged Blades next to your hero.

vigil keeper.name: Vigil Keeper
vigil keeper.text: After you cast a spell, gain a Damage Shield.

bless the meek.name: Bless The Meek
bless the meek.text: Draw two random minions from your deck that cost 2 or less. Give them +1 Attack and a Damage Shield.

echo of light.name: Echo Of Light
echo of light.text: Choose a friendly minion on High Ground. Summon a 3/3 copy of it on a random tile next to it.

harbinger.name: Harbinger
harbinger.text: Flying. After moving, deal 2 damage to adjacent enemies.

holy armory.name: Holy Armory
holy armory.text: After you cast a spell, summon a Winged Blade in an adjacent tile.

lightspear justicar.name: Lightspear Justicar
lightspear justicar.text: Whenever this unit deals damage, add a Lightspear to your hand.

radiant lance.name: Radiant Lance
radiant lance.text: Deal 4 damage to a minion in line of sight.

zealot.name: Zealot
zealot.text: Warcry: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion. If it is killed, gain a Damage Shield.

ardent inquisitor.name: Ardent Inquisitor
ardent inquisitor.text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies in line of sight.

become dust.name: Become Dust
become dust.text: Split a minion's Attack and Health randomly amongst other minions on its team, then Exile it.

evangelist.name: Evangelist
evangelist.text: Supremacy: At the end of each turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies on low ground.

skyborne crusader.name: Skyborne Crusader
skyborne crusader.text: After you cast a spell, gain Flying this turn.

life lash.name: Life Lash
life lash.text: Deal 2 damage to enemies and restore 2 Health to allies in a Chain.

starfall templar.name: Starfall Templar
starfall templar.text: Deep Strike. Warcry: Deal 2 damage to all adjacent enemies.

pillar of judgment.name: Pillar Of Judgment
pillar of judgment.text: At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemies in line of sight.

reckoning.name: Reckoning
reckoning.text: Deal 3 damage to ALL units on Low Ground.

high luminator cerys.name: High Luminator Cerys
high luminator cerys.text: Attacks all enemies in line of sight.
